Source: Durante o tempo que passam no Chile, percebem a necessidade de uma tradução para o espanhol do Livro de Mórmon.
First English Translation: During the time they spend in Chile, they realize the need for a translation of the Book of Mormon into Spanish.
Final Refined Translation: During their time in Chile, they recognize the necessity of a Spanish translation of the Book of Mormon.

Source: Posteriormente, o mesmo sonho se repetiu.
First English Translation: Later, the same dream repeated itself.
Final Refined Translation: Subsequently, the same dream recurred.

Source: Há um tipo de alegria e satisfação que somente é compreendida por meio de sentimentos espirituais.
First English Translation: There is a type of joy and satisfaction that can only be understood through spiritual feelings.
Final Refined Translation: There is a type of joy and satisfaction that can only be understood through spiritual feelings.

Source: 5. Exatidão dos Dados Informados.
First English Translation: 5. Accuracy of the Reported Data.
Final Refined Translation: 5. Accuracy of the Reported Data.

Source: As ordenanças continuarão na sua lista até que alguém as aceite.
First English Translation: The orders will remain on your list until someone accepts them.
Final Refined Translation: The orders will stay on your list until someone accepts them.

Source: Além de suas próprias provações pessoais, muitos enfrentaram e continuam a enfrentar preconceitos e mal-entendidos culturais mesmo em sua ala ou seu ramo.
First English Translation: In addition to their own personal trials, many have faced and continue to face prejudices and cultural misunderstandings even in their ward or branch.
Final Refined Translation: In addition to their own personal trials, many have faced and continue to encounter prejudice and cultural misunderstandings, even within their own congregations or branches.

Source: Ocorreu um erro ao salvar seu retrato.
First English Translation: An error occurred while saving your portrait.
Final Refined Translation: An error occurred while saving your portrait.

Source: Clique na caixa de seleção à esquerda de cada pessoa cujas ordenanças você deseja cancelar a reserva.
First English Translation: Click on the checkbox to the left of each person whose bookings you want to cancel.
Final Refined Translation: Click the checkbox located to the left of each individual whose bookings you wish to cancel.

Source: A indexação de registros é o acelerador que dá ao site FamilySearch.org o poder de conectar você aos seus antepassados.
First English Translation: The indexing of records is the accelerator that gives the website FamilySearch.org the power to connect you to your ancestors.
Final Refined Translation: The indexing of records serves as the catalyst that empowers the FamilySearch.org website to connect you with your ancestors.

Source: Tabela para listar até quatro gerações de antepassados.
First English Translation: Table to list up to four generations of ancestors.
Final Refined Translation: Table designed to list up to four generations of ancestors.

Source: E essa é a razão, porque o Espírito foi persistente.
First English Translation: And this is the reason why the Spirit was persistent.
Final Refined Translation: And that is the reason why the Spirit was persistent.

Source: Apesar de as ordenanças vicárias realizadas fora de sequência serem válidas, elas tornam-se eficazes somente depois que forem realizadas as ordenanças exigidas previamente.
First English Translation: Although the vicarious ordinances carried out out of sequence are valid, they only become effective after the previously required ordinances have been performed.
Final Refined Translation: Although the vicarious ordinances performed out of sequence are valid, they only take effect after the previously required ordinances have been completed.

Source: No mundo todo, como irmãos e irmãs no evangelho, podemos aprender uns com os outros, tornar-nos mais unidos e aumentar nosso amor mútuo.
First English Translation: Around the world, as brothers and sisters in the gospel, we can learn from one another, become more united, and increase our mutual love.
Final Refined Translation: Throughout the world, as brothers and sisters in the gospel, we can learn from each other, grow closer together, and enhance our mutual love.

Source: O chamado, Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Prêmio de Compra
First English Translation: The call, Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Purchase Award
Final Refined Translation: The announcement of the Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Purchase Prize

Source: O membro da Igreja John M. Bernhisel copiou partes de um manuscrito do Velho Testamento e um manuscrito separado do Novo Testamento cerca de um ano após a morte de Joseph Smith, quando Emma Smith emprestou a Bernhisel os manuscritos por um período de quase três meses.
First English Translation: The church member John M. Bernhisel copied parts of a manuscript of the Old Testament and a separate manuscript of the New Testament about a year after the death of Joseph Smith, when Emma Smith lent Bernhisel the manuscripts for a period of nearly three months.
Final Refined Translation: John M. Bernhisel, a member of the Church, copied portions of an Old Testament manuscript along with a separate manuscript of the New Testament approximately one year after Joseph Smith's death, during which time Emma Smith lent the manuscripts to Bernhisel for nearly three months.

Source: Enquanto as dimensões, funções e alguns aspectos da sua aparência foram especificados por revelação, outros elementos foram deixados para os líderes e trabalhadores locais decidirem.
First English Translation: While the dimensions, functions, and some aspects of its appearance were specified by revelation, other elements were left for local leaders and workers to decide.
Final Refined Translation: While the dimensions, functions, and certain aspects of its appearance were defined by revelation, other elements were left for local leaders and workers to determine.

Source: Acabei de terminar meu primeiro lote!
First English Translation: I just finished my first batch!
Final Refined Translation: I just finished my first batch!

Source: Incentivamos você a examinar todas as informações encontradas em cada uma das diretrizes antes de enviar.
First English Translation: We encourage you to examine all the information found in each of the guidelines before submitting.
Final Refined Translation: We encourage you to thoroughly review all information provided in each guideline prior to submission.

Source: Alguns dias depois de enviar essas cartas, Joseph e seus companheiros na prisão foram levados da cadeia e apresentados a um tribunal superior em Gallatin.
First English Translation: A few days after sending these letters, Joseph and his companions in prison were taken from the jail and presented to a higher court in Gallatin.
Final Refined Translation: A few days after sending these letters, Joseph and his fellow inmates were removed from the jail and brought before a higher court in Gallatin.

Source: Junte-se a nós para preparar o lançamento oficial do novo programa de indexação com base no navegador no site FamilySearch.org!
First English Translation: Join us to prepare for the official launch of the new browser-based indexing program on the FamilySearch.org site!
Final Refined Translation: Join us as we prepare for the official launch of the new browser-based indexing program at FamilySearch.org!

Source: Talvez esse legado seja o que inspira as gerações futuras a segui-los, ou talvez isso realmente esteja no sangue da família.
First English Translation: Maybe this legacy is what inspires future generations to follow them, or maybe this is truly in the family's blood.
Final Refined Translation: Perhaps this legacy is what inspires future generations to follow in their footsteps, or perhaps it genuinely flows through the family's veins.

Source: Este projeto não tem nenhum lote disponível para retirada.
First English Translation: This project does not have any lot available for pickup.
Final Refined Translation: This project does not have any lots available for collection.

Final Refined Translation: Internet indexing: I cannot view the complete page of the project instructions.

Final Refined Translation: Christ praying in Gethsemane

First English Translation: I was very hurt to hear them say old mother Smith Here comes old mother Smith.
Final Refined Translation: I felt very hurt when I heard them call her 'old Mother Smith.' There goes the old hag Mother Smith.

First English Translation: If you are using this operating system, download and use Firefox, Chrome, or Safari.
Final Refined Translation: If you are using this operating system, please download and use either Firefox, Chrome, or Safari.

Source: Eu tinha pesquisado por 20 anos para encontrar qualquer registro de casamento ou divórcio dos pais dela.
First English Translation: I had searched for 20 years to find any records of her parents' marriage or divorce.
Final Refined Translation: I had spent 20 years researching to find any records of her parents' marriage or divorce.

Source: Qual é o propósito desta nova página?
First English Translation: What is the purpose of this new page?
Final Refined Translation: What is the purpose of this new page?

Source: Somos gratos por seu trabalho dedicado nessa obra extraordinária.

Final Refined Translation: We sincerely appreciate your dedicated efforts on this extraordinary project.

Final Refined Translation: In your request, please provide the following information:

Source: mas agora se sentia abandonado.
First English Translation: but now he felt abandoned.
Final Refined Translation: but now he felt abandoned.

Source: Em 1976, John F. e Carmen ODonnal foram chamados para presidir a Missão Cidade da Guatemala e, depois, a Missão Guatemala Quetzaltenango.
First English Translation: In 1976, John F. and Carmen ODonnal were called to preside over the Mission City of Guatemala and then the Mission Guatemala Quetzaltenango.
Final Refined Translation: In 1976, John F. and Carmen O'Donnal were called to lead the Guatemala City Mission and subsequently took charge of the Quetzaltenango Guatemala Mission.

Source: Kimball assegurou a ele que os membros da área haviam expressado confiança nele.
First English Translation: Kimball assured him that the members of the area had expressed confidence in him.
Final Refined Translation: Kimball assured him that the members of the area had expressed their confidence in him.

Source: Nomeado para a Junta Educacional da Igreja
First English Translation: Appointed to the Educational Board of the Church
Final Refined Translation: Appointed to the Church Educational Board

Source: Você será notificado quando um patriarca for atribuído.
First English Translation: You will be notified when a patriarch is assigned.
Final Refined Translation: You will be notified when a patriarch is assigned.

Source: Sem dúvida, milhares de vidas serão modificadas com o resultado do esforço de hoje.
First English Translation: Without a doubt, thousands of lives will be changed by the result of today's effort.
Final Refined Translation: Undoubtedly, the outcomes of today's efforts will transform thousands of lives.

Source: Indexar registros históricos, talvez da terra natal de um antepassado.
First English Translation: Index historical records, perhaps from the birthplace of an ancestor.
Final Refined Translation: Index historical records, possibly originating from an ancestor's birthplace.

Source: Sabrina Jill Squires Estados Unidos Colagem e tinta acrílica sobre painel
First English Translation: Sabrina Jill Squires United States Collage and acrylic paint on panel
Final Refined Translation: Sabrina Jill Squires, United States, collage and acrylic paint on panel.

Source: Entrevistas recentes com diretores de indexação da estaca e líderes do sacerdócio mostram como determinadas estacas estão combinando perfeitamente a indexação com outras atividades de história da família em um esforço harmonioso que abençoa a vida em ambos os lados do véu.
First English Translation: Recent interviews with stake indexing directors and priesthood leaders show how certain stakes are perfectly combining indexing with other family history activities in a harmonious effort that blesses life on both sides of the veil.
Final Refined Translation: Recent interviews with indexing directors of stakes and priesthood leaders reveal how certain stakes are seamlessly combining indexing with various family history activities in a harmonious endeavor that enriches lives on both sides of the veil.

Source: Sou tão grata por essas histórias terem sido compartilhadas, mas, não apenas compartilhadas preservadas.
First English Translation: I am so grateful for these stories having been shared, but not just shared, preserved.
Final Refined Translation: I am so grateful that these stories have not only been shared but also preserved.

Source: Conforme esperado, Joseph a ensinou sobre isso e perguntou se ela seria selada a ele.
First English Translation: As expected, Joseph taught her about it and asked if she would be sealed to him.
Final Refined Translation: As anticipated, Joseph instructed her on this matter and inquired if she would be sealed to him.

Source: Suécia, Registros da Igreja de rebro, 16131918; índice 16351860
First English Translation: Sweden, Church Records of rebro, 16131918; index 16351860
Final Refined Translation: Sweden, Church Records of Örebro, 1613-1918; Index 1635-1860

Source: Coloque mais informações e detalhes aqui.
First English Translation: Put more information and details here.
Final Refined Translation: Please add more information and details in this section.

Source: Mercy perdera outro marido no auge da vida.
First English Translation: Mercy had lost another husband in the prime of life.
Final Refined Translation: Mercy had lost yet another husband at the height of his life.

Source: Agora você pode deslizar o nome da pessoa para removê-la do Histórico ou da lista de Antepassados com Tarefas.
First English Translation: Now you can swipe the person's name to remove them from the History or from the Ancestors with Tasks list.
Final Refined Translation: You can now swipe the name of the person to remove them from the History or the list of Ancestors with Tasks.

Source: A Firma Unida desempenhou um papel essencial na administração da Igreja de 1832 a 1834, exatamente como Whitney desempenhou um papel primordial na própria firma.
First English Translation: The United Firm played an essential role in the management of the Church from 1832 to 1834, just as Whitney played a pivotal role in the firm itself.
Final Refined Translation: The United Firm was instrumental in the administration of the Church between 1832 and 1834, just as Whitney was a key figure in the firm itself.

Source: E pensava: Não sou tão digna.
First English Translation: And she thought: I am not so worthy.
Final Refined Translation: And she thought to herself: I am not worthy.

Source: 3 Néfi 11:10; 15:2124; ver também João 10:16.
First English Translation: 3 Nephi 11:10; 15:21-24; see also John 10:16.
Final Refined Translation: 3 Nephi 11:10; 15:21-24; also see John 10:16.

Source: Os seis missionários e o motorista começaram a procurar por gasolina, a fim de continuar com sua jornada; por fim, trocaram meia saca de arroz por quinze litros de combustível mesmo sabendo que não seria suficiente para os quase 600 quilômetros de péssimas estradas.
First English Translation: The six missionaries and the driver began to look for gasoline in order to continue their journey; in the end, they traded half a sack of rice for fifteen liters of fuel, even knowing that it would not be enough for the nearly 600 kilometers of terrible roads.
Final Refined Translation: The six missionaries and the driver started looking for gasoline to continue their journey; ultimately, they exchanged half a sack of rice for fifteen liters of fuel, fully aware that this wouldn't be sufficient for the nearly 600 kilometers of poor roads ahead.

Source: Pouco se sabe sobre o conhecimento e os sentimentos de Emma em relação a esses casamentos, alguns dos quais envolviam compromissos nesta vida, ao passo que outros envolviam compromissos somente para a vida futura.
First English Translation: Little is known about Emma's knowledge and feelings regarding these marriages, some of which involved commitments in this life, while others involved commitments only for the afterlife.
Final Refined Translation: Little is known about Emma's understanding and feelings concerning these marriages, some of which entailed commitments in this life, while others pertained solely to obligations in the afterlife.

Source: Clique na seta para fechar o painel.
First English Translation: Click on the arrow to close the panel.
Final Refined Translation: Click on the arrow to close the panel.

Source: E compreendes seu pensar,
First English Translation: And you understand your thinking,
Final Refined Translation: And you understand your thinking.

Source: Os acontecimentos em Carthage levaram Joseph Fielding a encher várias páginas de seu diário com comentários sobre a vida, missão e morte de Joseph Smith.
First English Translation: The events in Carthage led Joseph Fielding to fill several pages of his journal with comments about the life, mission, and death of Joseph Smith.
Final Refined Translation: The events in Carthage prompted Joseph Fielding to write extensively in his journal about the life, mission, and death of Joseph Smith.

Source: O Élder Quentin L. Cook, que falará mais tarde nesta conferência, disse que A liderança da Igreja conclamou a nova geração a liderar o caminho no uso da tecnologia para vivenciar o espírito de Elias, pesquisar seus antepassados e realizar as ordenanças do templo para eles.
First English Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, who will speak later at this conference, said that the Church leadership has called upon the new generation to lead the way in using technology to experience the spirit of Elijah, research their ancestors, and perform the temple ordinances for them.
Final Refined Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, who will speak later in this conference, stated that the Church leadership has urged the new generation to take the lead in using technology to experience the spirit of Elijah, research their ancestors, and perform temple ordinances on their behalf.

Source: Annie Noble se filiou à Igreja Batista quando se casou.
First English Translation: Annie Noble joined the Baptist Church when she got married.
Final Refined Translation: Annie Noble became a member of the Baptist Church when she got married.

Source: Esse recurso aumenta o valor do Catálogo do FamilySearch como auxílio de pesquisa, tornando-se muito mais eficiente passar dos itens do catálogo para os dados digitais online.
First English Translation: This resource increases the value of the FamilySearch Catalog as a research aid, making it much more efficient to move from the catalog items to the online digital data.
Final Refined Translation: This tool enhances the value of the FamilySearch Catalog as a research aid, significantly improving the efficiency of transitioning from catalog entries to the online digital records.

Source: e mediu mais mil, e me fez passar por águas que me davam pelos lombos.
First English Translation: and measured more than a thousand, and made me pass through waters that reached my loins.
Final Refined Translation: and measured over a thousand, leading me through waters that came up to my lower back.

Source: Defina o endereço de IP estático da impressora.

Final Refined Translation: Set the printer's static IP address.

Source: O templo ainda estava longe de ser terminado e, se os santos fugissem da cidade, dificilmente conseguiriam receber sua investidura.
First English Translation: The temple was still far from being finished and, if the saints fled the city, they would hardly be able to receive their investiture.
Final Refined Translation: The temple was still far from being completed, and if the saints were to flee the city, it would be difficult for them to receive their investiture.

Source: Precisamos especialmente de ajuda na indexação de registros em espanhol, francês, italiano e português.

Final Refined Translation: We particularly require assistance with the indexing of records in Spanish, French, Italian, and Portuguese.

Final Refined Translation: Simple Ways to Celebrate Family History Month: A Journey into the Past

Final Refined Translation: On that day, I recall feeling extremely tired and having no desire to do anything.

Final Refined Translation: The Relief Societies indicated that there should be at least one instance of social service assistance per stake, and, when necessary, additional support should be provided at the ward level.

First English Translation: Some days later, a message from Joseph Ball, a missionary working in the Fox Islands, reported that the Kirtland dissenters had sent letters to the converts of Wilford in that area, trying to influence their faith.
